message: kynetx pros... does anyone know if the rules in my extension fire on iframes also? I seem to remember that they did... but it appears that it doesn't currently. Can anyone tell me?

"Currently KBX, Chrome & FF extensions do NOT fire within iFrames. Note that this is a recent change in behavior" citation from https://convore.com/kynetx/is-there-a-trick-so-rules-dont-fire-with-iframes/1238745/
